URLyBirdAloneFrame - Class in suncertify.gui
This class extends URLyBirdApplicationFrame to display the Alone Frame User Interface for the user to interact with when running in a non networking environment mode
URLyBirdAloneFrame(LocalURLyBirdServices) - Constructor for class suncertify.gui.URLyBirdAloneFrame
This one constructor constructs the alone frame passing the Object instance of the LocalURLyBirdServices instance making all available local functions for the alone service be available for use in this User Interface (JFrame) in a non networked environment

This is an abstract class that constructs the layout/design of the Application user interface.
URLyBirdApplicationFrame(String) - Constructor for class suncertify.gui.URLyBirdApplicationFrame
A constructor for this class which its super must be called by child class requiring its customised frame title name

URLyBirdClientFrame(RemoteURLyBirdServices) - Constructor for class suncertify.gui.URLyBirdClientFrame

URLyBirdClientImpl(String, long) - Constructor for class suncertify.services.URLyBirdClientImpl

URLyBirdConfigDialog(LocalURLyBirdServices, JFrame) - Constructor for class suncertify.gui.URLyBirdConfigDialog

URLyBirdConfigDialog(URLyBirdServices, JFrame) - Constructor for class suncertify.gui.URLyBirdConfigDialog
